subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: David Ortiz came up to bat with the bases loaded in the eighth inning, the Red Sox down by two runs, but Kyle Farnsworth struck him out.  Ortiz had failed in the clutch.
snippet: David Ortiz came up to bat with the bases loaded in the eighth inning, the Red Sox down by two runs, but Kyle Farnsworth struck him out.  Ortiz had failed in the clutch.
